statement.tex: \\ \text{If }(a+\iota b)\times X = a^2+b^2,\text{ then X equals what?}

reason.tex: \text{You can straight up multiply and see}\\ \quad (a+\iota b)\cdot (a-\iota b) = a^2 + b^2 \\ \text{Or, you could recall that } \\ \begin{align} a - \iota b &= \overline{a+\iota b} = \overline{z} \\ \text{and }z\cdot\overline{z} &= \vert z\vert^2 = a^2 + b^2 \end{align} \\ \text{Either way, } X = a - \iota b = \overline{a + \iota b}
